apisb-no-js: Used as error message in HTML
apisb-intro:
Used as intro text in [[Special:ApiSandbox]].

This message is followed by the ApiSandbox form.
apisb-legend-generator-parameters:
Used as fieldset label in [[Special:ApiSandbox]].

Refers to an [[mw:API:Query#Generators|API concept]]
apisb-result-request-url: Used as "label" for a read-only form field containing the exact URL that was (or is going to be) loaded.
apisb-result-request-post: Used as "label" for a ready-only form field containing the POST query parameters of the HTTP request made
apisb-label-format:
Label text for selecting the output format (json, xml, php, ...).
{{Identical|Format}}
apisb-label-action:
Label text for selecting the action (query, edit, ...). The default text in the select list is {{msg-mw|apisb-select-action}}.
{{Identical|Action}}
apisb-label-doc:
Label text of information about the selected action.
{{Identical|Documentation}}
apisb-select-action: This is the placeholder text in the "select" dropdown menu containing options with various action modules.
apisb-select-value: This is the generic placeholder text in "select" dropdown menus containing custom options (e.g. wiki namespaces, content direction, ..)
apisb-params-input: Table heading for the column with the input fields (e.g. text inputs, dropdown menus, checkboxes)
apisb-params-desc:
Table heading of the column containing the descriptions.
{{Identical|Description}}
apisb-params-deprecated:
Used to add a "deprecated" indication to the descriptions of parameters that have been deprecated. Parameters:
* $1 - parameter description
apisb-namespaces-error:
Unused at this time.

Used as error message when loading namespaces.
apisb-ns-main:
Refers to the main namespace, commonly put in parenthesis.
{{Identical|Main}}
apisb-submit: Submit button text that submits the form and performs the API request, after which the result is shown below
apisb-example: Button text that will reveal the example list, used if the list contains only 1 entry. See also {{msg-mw|apisb-examples}}
apisb-examples:
Button text that will reveal the example list, used if the list contains multiple entries.

See also:
* {{msg-mw|apisb-example}}.
{{Identical|Example}}
apisb-clear:
Title of the button that clears all inputs.
{{Identical|Clear}}
apisb-request-time:
Parameters:
* $1 - time taken to process this request (in seconds)
apisb-no-module-params:
Warning if module does not have any parameters. Parameters:
* $1 - name of API module
